public Card dealCard()
Deals a random card from unusedCards, and moves that card into boardCards.

verifySet

public boolean verifySet(Card card1,
                         Card card2,
                         Card card3)
Verifies whether the specified group of cards is a set.

Parameters:
card1 - First card
card2 - Second card
card3 - Third card
Returns:
True if the cards form a set and are on the board, false otherwise.
